whole_object: When zebras play tag, they really take "earning your stripes" to a whole new level!
single_object:
- Zebras: "Why do zebras never play hide and seek? Because good luck hiding when you’re always in black and white!"  
- Sand: "I told the sand to stop being so granular, but it just kept getting into the finer details!"
multi_object:
- Zebras  
- Sand  
- These zebras are really kicking up some sand—guess they’re just trying to make a “stripe” in the beach volleyball scene!  

- Sand  
- Zebras  
- This sand must be feeling a bit “zebra-ted” with all the stripes running around—talk about a wild beach party!
